alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 01 at 2:43AM CDT until November 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS, VERY LOW HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS... .The combination of breezy post-frontal northerly winds, critically low humidities, and dry to very dry fuels with ongoing drought conditions could make for dangerous fire weather conditions on Wednesday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT /11 AM CDT/ TODAY TO 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEAST ALABAMA, SOUTHWEST GEORGIA, THE FL PANHANDLE, PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA AND PORTIONS OF THE FL BIG BEND... The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon EDT /11 AM CDT/ today to 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WIND...North around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 18 to 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
